A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Every plot point and misdirection is spelt out to the viewer. Half of this movie had no forward momentum\, it was like watching a poorly written video game. Half of the major plot in this movie was meaningless\, characters jump the shark or just go through full on character assassinations.

The only saving grace is that visually it's impressive and pretty\, but a Star Wars movie this was not.

Don't let this Director/Writer touch the Star Wars universe ever again Disney.
